verses.verse: And Dinah <S%H1783><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Leah <S%H3812><s%>, whom she bare <S%H3205><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, went out <S%H3318><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

And Shechem <S%H7927><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, saw <S%H7200><s%> her <S%H3947><s%>; and he took her <S%H7901><s%>, and lay with her <S%H6031><s%>, and humbled her.

And his soul <S%H5315><s%> clave <S%H1692><s%> unto Dinah <S%H1783><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and he loved <S%H157><s%> the damsel <S%H5291><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> kindly <S%H3820><s%> unto the damsel <S%H5291><s%>.
And Shechem <S%H7927><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%> Hamor <S%H2544><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Get <S%H3947><s%> me this damsel <S%H3207><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>.

Now Jacob <S%H3290><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that he had defiled <S%H2930><s%> Dinah <S%H1783><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%>; and his sons <S%H1121><s%> were with his cattle <S%H4735><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>: and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> held his peace <S%H2790><s%> until they came <S%H935><s%>.
And Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> to commune <S%H1696><s%> with him <S%H854><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in from the field <S%H7704><s%> when they heard <S%H8085><s%> it <S%H582><s%>: and the men were grieved <S%H6087><s%>, and they were very <S%H3966><s%> wroth <S%H2734><s%>, because he had wrought <S%H6213><s%> folly <S%H5039><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> in lying <S%H7901><s%> with Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>; which thing ought not to be done <S%H6213><s%>.

And Hamor <S%H2544><s%> communed <S%H1696><s%> with them <S%H559><s%>, saying, The soul <S%H5315><s%> of my son <S%H1121><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%> longeth <S%H2836><s%> for your daughter <S%H1323><s%>: I pray you <S%H5414><s%>, give her unto him to wife <S%H802><s%>.
And make ye marriages <S%H2859><s%> with us <S%H5414><s%>; give your daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto us <S%H3947><s%>, and take our daughters unto you <S%H1323><s%>.

And ye shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> with us <S%H776><s%>: and the land shall be <S%H1961><s%> before you <S%H6440><s%>; dwell <S%H3427><s%> and trade <S%H5503><s%> ye therein <S%H270><s%>, and get you possessions therein.

And Shechem <S%H7927><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her father <S%H1><s%> and unto her brethren <S%H251><s%>, Let me find <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and what ye shall say <S%H559><s%> unto me I will give <S%H5414><s%>.

Ask <S%H7235><s%> me never so much <S%H3966><s%> dowry <S%H4119><s%> and gift <S%H4976><s%>, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> according as ye shall say <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H5414><s%>: but give me the damsel <S%H5291><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%> and Hamor <S%H2544><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> with guile <S%H4820><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%>, because he had defiled <S%H2930><s%> Dinah <S%H1783><s%> their sister <S%H269><s%>,

and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3808><s%>, We cannot do <S%H6213><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> our sister <S%H269><s%> to one <S%H376><s%> that is uncircumcised <S%H6190><s%>; for that were a reproach unto us <S%H2781><s%>.
Only on this <S%H2063><s%> condition will we consent <S%H225><s%> unto you <S%H2145><s%>: if ye will be as we are, that every male of you be circumcised <S%H4135><s%>;

then will we give <S%H5414><s%> our daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto you <S%H3947><s%>, and we will take your daughters <S%H1323><s%> to us <S%H3427><s%>, and we will dwell with you <S%H259><s%>, and we will become one people <S%H5971><s%>.
But if ye will not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto us <S%H4135><s%>, to be circumcised; then will we take <S%H3947><s%> our daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and we will be gone <S%H1980><s%>.
And their words <S%H1697><s%> pleased <S%H3190><s%> Hamor <S%H2544><s%>, and Shechem <S%H7927><s%> Hamor <S%H2544><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>.

And the young man <S%H5288><s%> deferred <S%H309><s%> not to do <S%H6213><s%> the thing <S%H1697><s%>, because he had delight <S%H2654><s%> in Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>: and he was honored <S%H3513><s%> above all the house <S%H1004><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>.

And Hamor <S%H2544><s%> and Shechem <S%H7927><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto the gate <S%H8179><s%> of their city <S%H5892><s%>, and communed <S%H1696><s%> with the men <S%H582><s%> of their city <S%H5892><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

These men <S%H582><s%> are peaceable <S%H8003><s%> with <S%H854><s%> us <S%H3427><s%>; therefore let them dwell in the land <S%H776><s%>, and trade <S%H5503><s%> therein <S%H776><s%>; for, behold, the land is large <S%H7342><s%> enough <S%H3027><s%> for them <S%H6440><s%>; let us take <S%H3947><s%> their daughters <S%H1323><s%> to us for wives <S%H802><s%>, and let us give <S%H5414><s%> them our daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

Only on this condition <S%H2063><s%> will the men <S%H582><s%> consent <S%H225><s%> unto us to dwell <S%H3427><s%> with us <S%H259><s%>, to become one people <S%H5971><s%>, if every male <S%H2145><s%> among us be circumcised <S%H4135><s%>, as they are circumcised <S%H4135><s%>.

Shall not their cattle <S%H4735><s%> and their substance <S%H7075><s%> and all their beasts <S%H929><s%> be ours <S%H225><s%>? only let us consent unto them <S%H3427><s%>, and they will dwell with us.

And unto Hamor <S%H2544><s%> and unto Shechem <S%H7927><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> all that went out <S%H3318><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%>; and every male <S%H2145><s%> was circumcised <S%H4135><s%>, all that went out <S%H3318><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%>.

And it came to pass on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, when they were sore <S%H3510><s%>, that two <S%H8147><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, Simeon <S%H8095><s%> and Levi <S%H3878><s%>, Dinah <S%H1783><s%>'s brethren <S%H251><s%>, took <S%H3947><s%> each man <S%H376><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> upon the city <S%H5892><s%> unawares <S%H983><s%>, and slew <S%H2026><s%> all the males <S%H2145><s%>.

And they slew <S%H2026><s%> Hamor <S%H2544><s%> and Shechem <S%H7927><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> Dinah <S%H1783><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, and went forth <S%H3318><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> upon the slain <S%H2491><s%>, and plundered <S%H962><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, because they had defiled <S%H2930><s%> their sister <S%H269><s%>.

They took <S%H3947><s%> their flocks <S%H6629><s%> and their herds <S%H1241><s%> and their asses <S%H2543><s%>, and that which was in the city <S%H5892><s%>, and that which was in the field <S%H7704><s%>;

and all their wealth <S%H2428><s%>, and all their little ones <S%H2945><s%> and their wives <S%H802><s%>, took they captive <S%H7617><s%> and made a prey <S%H962><s%>, even all that was in the house <S%H1004><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Simeon <S%H8095><s%> and Levi <S%H3878><s%>, Ye have troubled <S%H5916><s%> me <S%H3427><s%>, to make me odious to the inhabitants of the land <S%H776><s%>, among the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>: and <S%H4962><s%>, I being few in number <S%H4557><s%>, they will gather themselves together <S%H622><s%> against me <S%H5221><s%> and smite me <S%H5221><s%>; and I shall be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>, I and my house <S%H1004><s%>.
And they said <S%H559><s%>, Should he deal <S%H6213><s%> with our sister <S%H269><s%> as with a harlot <S%H2181><s%>?
